name: The Virtual Museum of Dead-Wifery
description:
It's a Book- it's a Walking Sim- it's "THE VIRTUAL MUSEUM OF DEAD-WIFERY"
---
Meet Mrs. Groan- in exciting color. The didactic meets the sensational when "America's Favoritest Little Dead Wife 2008" explores the moral perils of "Wife Gaming"- taking viewers on an odyssey filled with lessons sure to make you laugh and cry.

Additional writing and concepts by spinnylights
